name: exif-photo-printer
description: Create printable photos with EXIF data borders
author: EJ Fox

scripts.release: npm run tauri:build && gh release create v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") src-tauri/target/release/bundle/dmg/*.dmg --title "EXIF Photo Printer v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")" --notes "Release v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")"
scripts.release:patch: npm run version:patch && npm run release
scripts.release:minor: npm run version:minor && npm run release
scripts.release:major: npm run version:major && npm run release
